title: Open Source Infrastructure Grant
description: Supporting innovative open-source projects that enhance web3 infrastructure.

title: AI Safety Research Fund
description: Funding research to ensure AI systems remain aligned with human values.

title: Climate Tech Innovation Grant
description: Supporting startups developing technology to combat climate change.

title: DeFi Ecosystem Development
description: Supporting projects that enhance decentralized finance infrastructure and usability.

title: Healthcare Data Privacy Solutions
description: Funding innovative approaches to protecting healthcare data while enabling research.

title: Rural Internet Access Project
description: Supporting solutions that bring reliable internet to underserved rural communities.

title: Women in Tech Leadership Grant
description: Supporting women-led technology initiatives that promote gender equality and create opportunities for women in tech. This grant focuses on projects that provide training, mentorship, and career development for women in technology fields.
requirements: Clear impact metrics for women's advancement

title: Web3 Social Impact Innovation Grant
description: Supporting innovative Web3 projects that combine AI, blockchain, and social impact to empower underrepresented communities. This grant focuses on platforms that use emerging technologies to create more equitable access to resources and opportunities.
